package_name: Prague: The City of a Hundred Spires
region_description: Prague, the capital city of the Czech Republic, is known for its stunning architecture, rich history, and vibrant culture. Founded in the 9th century, Prague boasts a beautifully preserved medieval city center that is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The city's iconic landmarks include the Charles Bridge, Prague Castle, and the Astronomical Clock. With its charming streets, lively squares, and numerous cafes, Prague offers visitors a unique blend of history and modernity, making it an enchanting destination for travelers.

places_to_visit.name: Prague Castle
places_to_visit.description: Prague Castle is a historic fortress complex that has been the seat of Czech kings and presidents for over a thousand years, offering stunning views of the city.

places_to_visit.name: Charles Bridge
places_to_visit.description: Charles Bridge is a historic stone bridge adorned with statues, connecting the Old Town with the Lesser Town, and offering beautiful views of the Vltava River.

places_to_visit.name: Old Town Square
places_to_visit.description: Old Town Square is the heart of Prague, featuring the Astronomical Clock, historic buildings, and lively markets, making it a popular gathering place.

places_to_visit.name: Jewish Quarter
places_to_visit.description: The Jewish Quarter, or Josefov, is home to several historic synagogues and the Jewish Museum, showcasing the rich history of Jewish life in Prague.

hotels.name: Hotel Paris Prague
hotels.description: Hotel Paris is a luxury hotel with Art Nouveau style, offering elegant rooms and a prime location near major attractions.

hotels.name: Alchymist Grand Hotel & Spa
hotels.description: Alchymist Grand Hotel & Spa is a boutique hotel located in a historic building, featuring luxurious accommodations and a wellness center.

restaurants.name: Lokál Dlouháá
restaurants.description: Lokál Dlouháá is a popular restaurant serving traditional Czech cuisine and locally brewed beer in a vibrant setting.

restaurants.name: Café Louvre
restaurants.description: Café Louvre is a historic café known for its elegant interior and delicious pastries, a great spot for a relaxing break.
